name: AlfredSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, lock the front door”
”Alexa, unlock the front door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Alexa to control your Alfred Smart Lock.

With the Alfred Smart Home Skill and Alexa, you can now lock/unlock your Alfred lock* and check your lock’s status

*To unlock your door, just set a 4-digit code in the Alexa app. Go to the Smart Home section, select your Alfred Smart Lock, and enable the 'Unlock by voice' and '4-digit voice code' settings

Connecting Your Alfred Products to Alexa
Find information about connecting Smart Home devices at http://amzn.to/291lR7u

Required Alfred Products
-To control an Alfred Smart Lock with Alexa, you'll need the Alfred Smart Lock and the Alfred Connect to connect the lock to Wi-Fi

Additional Support
For additional help, please email support@alfredinc.com
